# SCtools

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/medewitt/SCtools.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/medewitt/SCtools)
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/medewitt/SCtools/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/medewitt/SCtools?branch=master)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package is a work in progress compiling functions to make it easier running placebo in space tests with synthetic control models and SCM with multiple treated units.

[Reference manual](SCtools-manual.pdf)


You can install it with `devtools`.

```r
library(devtools)

install_github('bcastanho/SCtools')
```
Or with the {remotes} package

```
library(remotes)
install_github("bcastanho/SCtools")
```
